ygData.subject: How to load (and use) a previously saved genome
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I ve tried to build a visualizer for my experiment, but I m not really sure how to load a genome. I took the source of the SkirmishVisualization project

Hello,

I've tried to build a visualizer for my experiment, but I'm not rea=
lly sure how to load a genome. I took the source of the SkirmishVisualizati=
on project as a reference, but it didn't help.

Here is what I've tried:

#=
 Method 1

    NeatGenome bestGenome =3D LoadBestGenome(@"path/to/genomes")=
;
    INetwork network =3D bestGenome.Decode(null);

# Method 2

    NeatGe=
nome bestGenome =3D LoadBestGenome(@"path/to/genomes");
    INetwork networ=
k =3D bestGenome.Decode(new Sine());

# Method 3

    NeatGenome bestGenome=
 =3D LoadBestGenome(@"path/to/genomes");
    Substrate substrate =3D new Su=
bstrate(37, 0, 9, new Sine());
    INetwork network =3D substrate.generateG=
enome(bestGenome.Decode(null)).Decode(null);

Code for LoadBestGenome:

   =
 private NeatGenome LoadBestGenome(string path)
    {
        FileInfo best=
GenomeFileInfo =3D new DirectoryInfo(path).GetFiles("bestGenome*.xml").Orde=
rBy(fi =3D> fi.CreationTime).Last();
        XmlDocument document =3D new X=
mlDocument();

        document.Load(bestGenomeFileInfo.FullName);
        =
    
        return SharpNeatLib.NeatGenome.Xml.XmlNeatGenomeReaderStatic.R=
ead(document);
    }


After loading the genome and creating the network, I=
've set the input values and processed the output values just like in the e=
valuations. The problem is, that none of the methods I've tried had the exp=
ected result. The calculated fitness in the visualizer project is 0 (actual=
ly less than 0), but the genomes are saved with a fitness greater than 1.

=
Why do I get these different outputs / What's wrong with this code?

Cheers=
,
Daniel
